message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair offer.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me to consider. How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $11,250?  This reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
